name: Headpiece Fashion Fracas (Final)
description:
Your old coder friend from the Greenhouse platformer is getting surrounded by hat-stealing drones! Someone hacked their way into the mainframe and caused this bug! He can fix them, but only after the protocol cube has been dislodged, and he can't do that while the drones are running amok. That's where you come in.

________________________________________________________________________________

THIS IS ANOTHER COLLEGE PROJECT; STILL NOT GONNA BE THE BEST QUALITY! I also apologize for similar reasons for animation and UI issues as the last time they popped up.

Ian Kelly is on Wyzant.com as a tutor.

INCASE YOU CAN'T SEE THE CONTROLS MENU:

W-forward, S-back, A-turn left, D-turn right, Space-jump, LMB-fire (can be spammed)
